description:
Reuniclus, known as the Multilplying Pok√©mon, has a pale-colored inner body that is encapsulated within a blob of a translucent, green gel-like substance. Reuniclus can increase their psychic powers by linking their brains with others in a network. They join this network by shaking hands with others. With high intelligence, it fights by manipulating its arms with a grip that can crush rocks.
IGN compared it to "experiments from the Lilo and Stitch TV series", and also noting "It`s like a cute baby version of the X-Men villain, Holocaust". Game Informer`s Jeff Marchiafava called it "amazing", stating "Nintendo can even make a friggin` nucleus look cute!".
name: Lanculus
